name: LienLog.com
tag_list: tax-lien, lien, liens, lien-software, management, solution, future, investing, real-estate
overview:
LienLog.com harnesses the power of cloud computing to deliver the most comprehensive integrated system of advanced research, analytical, portfolio modeling, management, and sharing tools available to tax lien certificate investors anywhere. 30-Day Free Trial!

LienLog.com was founded by a team of successful real estate investors and experienced financial technologists who could not find one comprehensive software tool for reducing the costs and operational overhead of servicing and managing their own portfolios of tax lien certificates.

In development for over two years, LienLog.com reduces the burdens of servicing tax lien portfolios by combining the functionality of multiple applications:

Spreadsheets Databases Calendars Charting and visualization Portfolio management Contact management Document management and storage

LienLog.com combines all these and more into one easy to use business application interface that is accessible from everywhere with an Internet connection.

LienLog.com is a cornerstone in the development of a Secondary Tax Lien Market. LienLog.com enables this through its ability to share data and analytics about individual tax lien certificates and multiple portfolios (or groupings) of tax lien certificates in a common format, in real time and on-line.

LienLog.com data and information sharing may be integrated, through the creation of custom APIs and interfaces, with current and future Secondary Market electronic marketplaces including LienLog.com, TaxLienMarket.com, LienMarket.com, and others.
